item.title: Error with Potions.java [Delta]
item.dc:creator: @lostmyphat lostmyphat
item.description:
@lostmyphat wrote:

[quote=“runescape sucks, post:3, topic:421593”][quote author=lostmyphat link=topic=524251.msg3815011#msg3815011 date=1321240751]

final int Min = 0; final int Max = 100; final int random = (int) (Min + Math.random() * Max); yell ("[DICE] "+playerName+" has rolled a " + random + "% on the percentile dice. [DICE]");
[/quote]
Thanks, but i JUST found the error, the int was out of place.[/quote]
Okay.

item.title: Error with Potions.java [Delta]
item.dc:creator: @runescape_sucks runescape sucks
item.description:
@runescape_sucks wrote:

I tried to make a dicing Item, that is when you dice it says what you have rolled. But I get an error from this.
This is my current code

int gaamble = misc.random(40); case 391: plrText = ""+gaamble+""; break;

This is the error i recieve from this.

potions.java:12: case, default, or '}' expected int gaamble = misc.random(40); ^ potions.java:12: case, default, or '}' expected int gaamble = misc.random(40); ^ potions.java:12: case, default, or '}' expected int gaamble = misc.random(40); ^ potions.java:12: case, default, or '}' expected int gaamble = misc.random(40); ^ potions.java:12: case, default, or '}' expected int gaamble = misc.random(40); ^ potions.java:12: case, default, or '}' expected int gaamble = misc.random(40); ^ potions.java:12: case, default, or '}' expected int gaamble = misc.random(40); ^ potions.java:12: case, default, or '}' expected int gaamble = misc.random(40); ^ potions.java:12: case, default, or '}' expected int gaamble = misc.random(40); ^ potions.java:12: case, default, or '}' expected int gaamble = misc.random(40);

Read full topic
